Name: LISTERINE Miswak Mouthwash 250ml
Description:
Product Description:

Listerine Total Care Miswak Milder Taste Mouthwash fights millions of germs left behind after brushing with a powerful combination of science and natural miswak extract. It provides 12 hours of germ protection and leaves your mouth pure and clean! Use twice daily. Listerine Total Care Miswak Milder Taste is an alcohol-free mouthwash proven to give you a pure and clean mouth.


Rich in fluorine, silica, and a host of antimicrobial compounds, miswak extract packs a serious punch. Miswak is obtained from the twigs of the Arak tree, although it can also come from walnut and olive trees. There are many scientists who believe that miswak extract has multiple benefits for your teeth. Some of the benefits of using miswak are fighting plaque, fighting gum disease, preventing any existing teeth decay from getting worse, it contains minerals such as chloride, sodium bicarbonate and potassium, strengthen the enamel in your teeth, and eventually leaves you with a healthy mouth. And you can now enjoy Listerine with miswak extract in a daily use product and make it part of your oral care routine in the simplest possible way.


We at Listerine are not only committed to helping you maintain the best oral health, but also dedicated to protecting our planet. Listerine continuously strives to be more responsible and help promote a healthier planet. We use 100% recyclable bottles and caps*. Our new bottles now contain 50% post-consumer recycled plastic.


*Where facilities exist; safety seal excluded.


Features & Benefits:
12 hours germ protection: fights millions of germs that cause bad breath and features a refreshing flavour
Reduces plaque: It helps reduce and prevent plaque, a major cause of gum disease
Fights gum diseases: Fights bacteria above and below the gum line to keep gums healthy
Freshens breath: It freshens breath while helping to make teeth stronger than brushing alone
Strengthens teeth: The unique formula strengthens tooth enamel even in hard-to-reach places to help prevent cavities
New-100% recyclable bottles and 50% post-consumer recycled plastic- Our new bottle now contains 50% post-consumer recycled plastic. Also, we use 100% recyclable bottles and caps*
*Where facilities exist; safety seal excluded.








How to use:
Use twice daily. Especially effective when used in the morning and in the evening after brushing. Pour 20 ml (4 x 5 ml teaspoonfuls) into a glass, rinse around teeth and gums for 30 seconds, then spit out.







Caution & Warnings:
Not suitable for use in children under 12 years. Do not swallow. If swallowed, get medical help. Do not use if allergic to any of the ingredients. Stop use and ask a dentist if oral irritation occurs. Keep out of the reach of children.

Ingredients:

Aqua, Sorbitol, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Poloxamer 407, Eucalyptol, Zinc Chloride, Benzoic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Aroma, Methyl Salicylate, Thymol, Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Saccharin, Menthol, Caramel, Sucralose, Glycerin, Salvadora Persica Stem Extract. Contains Sodium Fluoride (220 ppm F ¯ ).

Name: Parachute Coconut Oil (Edible) 500 ml
Description:
Product Description:

Made from the hand-picked and finest sun-dried coconuts, this 100% pure and edible coconut oil has a long-lasting freshness and a nutty aroma. This is a multi-purpose oil and can be used for various functions like cooking, haircare or skincare. The oil is manufactured by going through 27 quality tests and 5 stage purification process, without a single touch by hand. It is made with no scent, preservatives, or chemicals promising 100% safety and purity for up to 18 months. The bottle is designed to have a tamper-proof seal which allows the aroma of the oil to stay for a long time. The parachute coconut oil has the properties for strengthening hair and providing nourishment to the scalp. Restore your hair and skin’s natural health and shine using this oil. Licensed by FSSAI as an edible grade coconut oil. It comes in a bottle of 500 ml.

• Parachute Edible Coconut Oil, made from the finest natural sun-dried coconuts that are handpicked.

• Multi-purpose oil and has a long-lasting freshness and a nutty aroma.

• Manufactured using 27 quality tests and 5 stage purification process.

• No chemicals, no scent, no preservatives

• Tamper-proof seal stays safe and preserves the aroma for up to 18 months.

• It can be used in all kinds of food.

• Repairs the dryness of the scalp and maintains moisture and hydration.

• Suitable for all hair types and all skin types.

• Licensed by FSSAI as an edible grade coconut oil.




How to use:

To use on hair:

Before applying oil, brush your hair to get rid of any knots or tangles.

Pour about one teaspoon of the oil on your palm and rub your hands together to spread it well.

Using your fingertips work it into your scalp thoroughly.

After massaging on the scalp, take some oil on your palms and apply it on the ends.

Leave the oil in your hair for at least 30 minutes. Shampoo your hair thoroughly to remove all the oil from the hair, and rinse.

To use on skin:

Wash your face using any cleanser.

Put a teaspoon of coconut oil on your palms and massage it on your face.

Gently massage in circular motions.

Apply on any other areas of skin where you feel dryness.

To use for cooking:

Use the oil to bake, grill, roast, or fry all kinds of food.




Caution & Warnings:

• Keep away from mouth, nose, throat, and eyes. It can be harmful and may cause burning, or irritation. Rinse immediately if the oil goes in your eyes.

• Keep away from children. It can be toxic if it goes in the eyes, mouth, nose, and throat.

• Store it in a cool and dry place.

• Some people may have allergic reactions to the product. In case you experience any burning sensations, swelling, or irritation, contact a physician and refrain from using the product again.

• Keep away from flame or a heat source, as it may catch fire.




Ingredients:

Pure coconut oil.

Brand: Parachute
Product Form: Hair Oil
Product Type: Hair Oil
Quantity: 1 Pc

Name: Biomil Plus Baby Milk  (2) 400 gm
Description:
Product Description:
Suitable for babies from 6 to 12 months
From six months onwards, in addition to relying on milk, your baby needs complimentary foods in order to get the nutrients needed to continue to grow and develop

Your baby is growing fast. At this stage, you will notice his ability to mimic sounds and gestures, sit up, crawl, and play with others. Behind these milestones are billions of neural connections forming in his brain.
Providing proper nutrition and stimulation at this crucial time will positively impact how his brain and body develops, setting the stage for his learning and success, now and into the future. .
How to use:
Wash your hands before preparing baby’s formula.
Wash bottle or cup, teat and cap thoroughly until no milk remains.
Boil for five minutes. Leave covered until use.
Boil drinking water for five minutes; allow to cool.
Consult feeding table, pour exact amount of lukewarm water into the bottle or cup.
Use only the scoop from this container. Powder must be leveled.
Consult feeding table, add exact number of level scoops.
Stir contents of cup or shake capped bottle well until formula is fully dissolved.
Close can tightly after each use and store in a cool and dry place. Must be used within 4 weeks after opening.

Caution & Warnings:

Breast milk is the best nutrition for babies and breastfeeding should continue for as long as possible. Consult your healthcare professional before using the product and to know the right way to use it.
Use only the enclosed scoop. Using more or less powder than indicated will either lead to dehydration or deprive your baby of proper nutrition. Do not change proportions without medical advice.
Infants older than 6 months require supplemental foods in addition to formula.
Consult your health care professional before introducing any new food to baby’s diet. If an earlier introduction of new foods is recommended by your healthcare professional, reduce formula intake as advised.
Expiration date / Manufacturing date printed on bottom of can.
Avoid prolonged storage at excessive temperatures.

Ingredients:

DHA & AA ( precursors & pre-formed - algae oil - vegetarian source ) ,Alpha-Lactalbumin (60% whey and 40% casein),  Probiotics (FOS) and Vitamins & Minerals .

Product Details:

Brand: Biomil

Quantity: 1 Pc

Name: Il Salone Protein Promo Pack Shampoo+Conditioner
Description:
Product Description:

II Salone Protein promo Pack Shampoo Conditioner makes your
hair look silkier and shinier than ever before.
Best suited for people with dry
to normal hair, it helps to bring softness, vigor, and life back to your dull
hair.
It revitalizes lifeless hair and makes it bouncier and softer.
Filled
with the goodness of wheat and milk proteins, it restructures and nourishes
your hair.
You also get a protein-packed conditioner in this combo pack, which
brings back the luster in extremely dry and damaged hair.
It nourishes and
replenishes the hair, leaving it invigorated. 

Features:

The moisturizing hair product provides hydration and adds
brilliant shine and fluidity to normal and dry hair
Formulated to smooth and tame your hair. With remarkable
softness, your fingers will glide easily through your ultra-touchable hair
The shampoo and conditioner are both infused with milk and
wheat protein necessary for hydration and nourishment
Salon quality treatment at home

How to use:

Comb your hair before getting in the bath or shower. Combing
the hair helps to detangle it and this prevents hair loss while shampooing.
Wet your hair with cold water.
Take an appropriate amount of shampoo in your palms and
lather it properly with some water. Apply it on your hair uniformly.
Massage the scalp first and then move on to massaging the
rest of the hair.
Massage for a few minutes and then wash your hair with cold
water.
You will then need to pat your hair dry once with a clean
and dry towel. You don’t have to dry out your hair completely, just a single
dab will do.
Take some conditioner in your hand and apply it to your wet
hair uniformly. 
Keep it on your head for a minute or two. 
Rinse with cold water. Make sure to get rid of all the
conditioner from your hair. 
Pat dry with a clean and dry towel. 

Caution & Warnings:

Keep away from direct sunlight
Rinse immediately when it comes in contact with your eyes
In case of any allergic reactions, consult a dermatologist
immediately

Ingredients:

Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulphate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine,
Perfume, Cocamide Mea, Glycol Distearate, Ceramides.

Compressed and individually wrapped sanitary pads for ultimate protection
All private products present Natural Cotton feel top cover for unique Softness and Comfort.
How to use:
Pads have adhesive strips to attach securely to your panties
Remove the paper backing and press the sticky side of the pad to your underwear
If your pad also has wings extra flaps that fold over the sides of your underwear
For more protection remove the paper backing and wrap the wings around the crotch pressing firmly to the underside of your panties
When should I change my pad :
You’ll want to change your pad regularly to stay clean and comfortable
Usually every 3–4 hours or more often if your flow is heavy
Remember to match the absorption capacity  of the pad your flow not your body type
Caution and Warnings :
Don't flush the used product in the toilet.
To avoid danger of suffocation, keep this plastic bag away from babies and children.

Name: Primalac Premium Ultima Baby Milk (1) 400 gm
Description:
Product Description:





Primalac® Ultima 1 with Nutractive blend, the new generation of infant formula .


Primalac® Ultima 1 is inspired by the uniqueness of breast milk and supports the breastfeeding and sustains it longer with a 100% lactose content for the first six month.


The primalac® Ultima 1 formula with the unique Nutractive blend which is our exclusive innovation tailored specially to decrease all GIT disorders like constipation, colic ®urgitation & supports all the nutritional needs of your baby from 0 to 6 Months.


Primalac Ultima range is a Swiss made formula following the highest manufacturing techniques with latest innovative technology





How to use:





wash your hands with soap and water, and dry using a clean towel


wash feeding bottle, nipple, and cap then boil them for 5 minutes


Boil drinking water for 5 mins and allow cool to 40 C


Check the feeding table, pour the exact amount of water into the feeding bottle


add the exact amount of leveled scoops of the product, using the enclosed scoop then close the bottle


Shake the bottle well until the powder is fully dissolved.





Caution & Warnings:





un boiled water and bottle or incorrect preparation can make your baby ill


prepare the bottle at one time, Throw away any unfinished milk after feeding


Use only the enclosed scoop


Use content after opening for a maximum of 4 weeks .use by the date shown on the base of the tin.


store the tin in a cold and dry place





Ingredients:





Primalac ® ultima 1 contains the milk fat OPO with no palm oil which is an innovative fat blend that is closer to the breast milk, to support bone mineralization, better digestive well being &healthy beneficial gut bacteria with less incidence of constipation and discomfort


The Primalac® Ultima 1 formula contains HMOs for a better immune system and strengthens the beneficial gut flora for a healthy outcomes


The primalac® Ultima Formula contains a high amount of omega 3 & omega 6 with a ratio of 1:1 to enhance brain development


The primalac® Ultima formula has a better ( taste & smell ) , thanks to the unique innovation of the Fat milk and OPO


Primalac ®Ultima 1 contains all the vitamins and minerals required for optimum growth and ensures the satisfaction of all nutritional needs from 0 to 6 months

Name: Blemil Baby Milk Plus Optimum (1) 400 Gm
Description:
Product Description:





Blemil plus 1 is the complete infant formula with all the nutrients necessary to meet the requirements of infants from birth and up to 6 months of age. The improved formula incorporates prebiotics, which enhances the proper development of the immune and digestive systems, and lutein, which helps to ensure adequate visual acuity.





How to use:





Blemil plus 1 is prepared in a mixture of 4.5 g to 30 ml of water.





Caution & Warnings:





Store at room temperature 25 ° c.





Ingredients:





Blemil plus 1 is the complete infant formula with all the nutrients necessary to meet the needs of infants from birth and up to 6 months of age. Thanks to its innovative composition, it ensures optimal growth and maturation of the immune and digestive systems as well as the proper function of the infant's brain and visual systems.


The improved blemil plus 1 formula incorporates innovative ingredients such as prebiotics, which enhance the smooth operation of the immune and digestive systems, and lutein, which helps to ensure adequate visual acuity.





Blemil plus 1 contains:





Proteins: it has a balanced ratio of serum/casein proteins (60/40) similar to that of breast milk. It also has a high content of α-lactalbumin (15%), a high-quality protein fraction that helps adapt the protein intake to the degree of maturation of the baby's digestive system and kidneys, while maintaining a high concentration of essential amino acids.


Α-lactalbumin is rich in sialic acid, a component that has a bifidogenic effect as well as being immunomodulatory and antibacterial, so it helps protect against infections. Moreover, sialic acid is important in brain development. Adequate tolerance of α-lactalbumin and its high tryptophan content contribute to improving the behavior and well-being of infants.


Nucleotides are involved in the development and maturation of the digestive and immune response systems.


It is supplemented with taurine and l-carnitine, nutrients essential for metabolizing fatty acids and the resulting energy production. Additionally, these are important for the maturation of the central nervous system as well as the development of brain structures and the visual function.


Carbohydrates: it contains lactose.


It contains prebiotics (fructooligosaccharides, or fos), which improve the balance of the intestinal flora by stimulating the growth of beneficial bacteria in the digestive tract, help to prevent the growth of pathogens and stimulate the maturation of natural defenses.


Fats: it has a fatty acid profile similar to that of breast milk, with an adequate content of essential fatty acids and lc-pufas ω-3 and ω-6 (dha and aa). These are important for the development of the central nervous system and the visual function as well as for protection against inflammatory processes. They also have other functions in the digestive system, such as helping to decrease the consistency of stools and stimulating the absorption of nutrients, improving the digestibility of the formula.


Lutein, a natural antioxidant present in breast milk and involved in the development and maintenance of proper visual functions.


Vitamins and minerals: it contains vitamins and minerals that cover the daily needs of the infant, including zinc (for the optimal functioning of natural defenses and growth) as well as selenium and vitamin e, which prevent the oxidation of lc-pufas

Blemil plus 3 contains:

Proteins: it provides an adequate protein content adapted to the needs of young children and their degree of maturation.
It is enriched with nucleotides, nutrients that help to complete the development of infants' digestive system, and immune function.
It is supplemented with carnitine, which is involved in the maturation of the central nervous system and brain structures.

Probiotics (b. Infantis and l. Rhamnosus) and prebiotics (fos), nutrients that modulate the immune system and have a bifidogenic effect in the intestine, preventing the growth of pathogenic bacteria and the development of infections. These also contribute to the maturation of the digestive system and the regulation of intestinal transit.
Vitamins and minerals: it is enriched with calcium, iron, and 13 vitamins so that daily consumption of 500 ml of Blemil plus 3 provides more than 50% of the requirements of these nutrients.

Name: BabyJoy Size (5) Mega Pack 52 Diapers
Description:
Product description:
Babies enjoy movement at all times. As they grow, diaper changing does not remain easy.
BabyJoy Tape diapers provide effective protection against leakage with the Compressed Diamond Pad feature.
Features:




Compressed Diamond Pad:

Absorbs up to 6 cups to prevent leakage.         
	




Waist Stretch:

Prevents leakage of urine and stool.






Comfortable Fitting Shape:

Perfect fit around baby’s legs.
	




Breathable Material:

Allows the passage of moist air through the diapers, Prevents irritation and redness of the skin.






Soft Cotton Touch:

Gentle to Baby’s skin.
	




Navel Cut:

Helps heal the Newborn’s navel and prevents infections.


How to use:








Step 1:

The back half of the diaper is the half with the tapes on it.
Open up the diaper and pull the leakage guards upright.







Step 2:

Place the back half of the diaper under your baby making sure that the top of the back comes up to your baby's waist.
Doing this will ensure a snug fit.
Check this again after you've finished putting on the diaper.






Step 3:

Placing one hand on the diaper on top of your baby's stomach to ensure that the diaper stays flat, pull up the tape and attach it to the front of the diaper.
Repeat on the other side.
Make sure the tape does not touch your baby's skin.

Name: Biomil Plus Baby Milk  (1) 400 gm
Description:
Product Description:
Infant milk formula suitable for feeding  healthy infants from birth to 6 months when  breastfeeding is not applied 

The first six months of life is a crucial window for your baby’s healthy growth and development.
You will notice your baby’s ability to recognize people and objects, smile and roll over.
Behind these milestones are billions of neural connections forming in his brain which, along with his healthy physical growth, enable him to embrace and learn from every new encounter.
Providing proper nutrition and stimulation during this time will positively impact his development, setting the stage for his learning and success, now and into the future.
Early programming with Growth outcomes.
Favorable GIT tolerability
How to use:
Wash your hands before preparing baby’s formula.
Wash bottle or cup, teat and cap thoroughly until no milk remains.
Boil for five minutes. Leave covered until use.
Boil drinking water for five minutes; allow to cool.
Consult feeding table, pour exact amount of lukewarm water into the bottle or cup.
Use only the scoop from this container. Powder must be leveled.
Consult feeding table, add exact number of level scoops.
Stir contents of cup or shake capped bottle well until formula is fully dissolved.
Close can tightly after each use and store in a cool and dry place. Must be used within 4 weeks after opening.

Caution & Warnings:

Breast milk is the best nutrition for babies and breastfeeding should continue for as long as possible. Consult your healthcare professional before using the product and to know the right way to use it.
Use only the enclosed scoop. Using more or less powder than indicated will either lead to dehydration or deprive your baby of proper nutrition. Do not change proportions without medical advice.
Infants older than 6 months require supplemental foods in addition to formula.
Consult your health care professional before introducing any new food to baby’s diet. If an earlier introduction of new foods is recommended by your healthcare professional, reduce formula intake as advised.
Expiration date / Manufacturing date printed on bottom of can.
Avoid prolonged storage at excessive temperatures.

Ingredients:

Oligofructose, Emulsifiers (Soy Lecithin, Monoglycerides Distilled INS471), 2'-Fucosyl-D-Lactose, L-Tyrosine, Acidity Regulator (Citric Acid), Taurine, Nucleotides (Cytidine 5'-Monophosphate, Disodium Uridine-5'-Monophosphate, Adenosine- 5'- Monophosphate.
Disodium Inosine-5'-Monophosphate, Disodium Guanosine-5'-Monophosphate), L-Tryptophan, Antioxidants (Mixed Tocopherols Concentrate, L-Ascorbyl Palmitate), L-Carnitine, Lutein (from Marigold). Minerals: Potassium Citrate, Sodium Citrate, Magnesium Chloride, Calcium Carbonate, Calcium Chloride, Calcium Phosphate, Potassium Carbonate, Calcium Hydroxide, Sodium Chloride, Ferrous Sulfate, Potassium Hydroxide, Zinc Sulfate, Copper Sulfate, Manganese Sulfate, Potassium Iodide, Sodium Selenite.

Indulge yourself with Glysolid hand cream which comes with an advanced European formula that helps keep your hands, feet, and body smooth, soft, and moisturized through the day. Name: Dove Conditioner Daily Care 340ml
Description:
Product Description:

Dove Conditioner Daily Care (340 ml) is a gentle, nourishing conditioner designed for everyday use to keep your hair healthy, soft, and manageable.
Its mild formula is enriched with Dove’s unique Moisture Lock Technology, which provides the right balance of hydration without weighing down your hair.
Suitable for all hair types, this conditioner helps to replenish moisture, smooth frizz, and enhance the natural shine of your hair, making it feel refreshed and full of life every day.
Whether your hair is dry, oily, or somewhere in between, Dove Daily Care Conditioner is a simple solution to keep your hair looking its best.

Product Features:

Everyday Nourishment: Provides essential hydration and nourishment, making it perfect for daily use on all hair types.
Moisture Lock Technology: Helps to lock in moisture, ensuring hair stays hydrated and soft without feeling greasy or weighed down.
Gentle & Lightweight Formula: Offers a light, non-greasy finish, making it ideal for fine, normal, or oily hair.
Improves Hair Manageability: Makes hair smoother, easier to comb, and more manageable, reducing frizz and tangles.
Adds Shine: Leaves hair with a healthy, natural shine, enhancing its overall appearance.
Suitable for All Hair Types: Works well for dry, oily, or combination hair, providing nourishment without over-moisturizing.
Pleasant Fragrance: Leaves your hair with a clean, fresh scent that lasts throughout the day.

How to Use:

After shampooing with Dove Daily Care Shampoo, apply a generous amount of Dove Conditioner Daily Care to your damp hair.
Massage the conditioner into your hair, concentrating on the mid-lengths and ends where your hair is typically drier.
Leave the conditioner in for 1-3 minutes to allow it to nourish and hydrate.
Rinse thoroughly with warm water to reveal soft, manageable hair.
For best results, use daily as part of your hair care routine, along with Dove Daily Care Shampoo.

Caution & Warnings:

For external use only.
Avoid contact with eyes. If the product gets into your eyes, rinse immediately with plenty of water.
Discontinue use if irritation or allergic reaction occurs.
Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients:

Water (Aqua)
Cetearyl Alcohol (conditioning agent)
Dimethicone (provides smoothness and shine)
Glycerin (moisturizer)
Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine (detangler and conditioner)
Preservatives to ensure the product remains safe and effective.
Fragrance (optional)

Note: Ingredients may vary slightly depending on formulation, so please refer to the product packaging for the most accurate and up-to-date list.

Name: Ronalac Baby Milk (1) 1700 gm
Description:
Product Description:



Ronalac-1 starter formula for infants from birth to 6 months,


Breast milk is the optimal for healthy growth and development as it is perfectly balanced to support your baby's growth and provide a stronger immune system, however if you are unable to breastfeed, Ronalac fortified with iron is the optimal start from birth up to 6 months, and fortified with IMMUNOBOOSTER system to support immune response and protection, with the optimal GIT tolerability.


Ronalac-1 is nutritionally balanced and provides all vitamins and minerals, meets the required needs from different nutrients to ensure optimal visual, mental and psychomotor development.



How to use:



Wash your hands


Clean and sterilize all utensils (feeding bottle, nipple), by placing it in boiling water for 10 minutes.


Boil drinking water for 5 minutes and allow to cool


Pour exact amount of lukewarm water in the feeding bottle,


Add 1 leveled scoop (4.4g) to 30 ml of water, and prepare total volume according to baby’s needs


Close the feeding bottle and gently shake until the powder completely dissolved, then feed immediately


Before giving feedings, test the temperature on the back of hand, you can cool it under cold water, until becomes lukewarm.


Close the tin tightly after each use, and store it in a cool and dry place for only 4 weeks from the opening



Caution & Warnings:



Do not use the powder if the tin was opened for more than 14 days.


Do not use your hand to get the scoop from the tin, however you can use clean and dry spoon.


Using only the scoop inside the tin and after use store it inside the tin


Use prepared feeds within 1 hour, and always discard unfinished feeds


Do not heat feeds in microwave,



Ingredients:










Demineralized cow’s whey (milk), vegetable oils (palm,soya, coconut, sunflower), maltodextrin, skimmed cow’smilk, lactose, minerals (calcium carbonate, potassium chloride, calcium phosphate, sodium citrate, sodium chloride, magnesium sulfate, ferric pyrophosphate, zinc sulfate, copper sulfate, potassium iodide, manganese sulfate, sodium selenite),fishoil, vegetable emulsifier (soyalecithin), choline bitartrate, vitamins (C, E, beta carotene, PP, A, D3, B5, biotin, K1, B1, B6, B12, B9, B2), L-phenylalanine, taurine ,nucleotides, antioxidants: ascorbyl palmitate, mixed tocopherol concentrate, L-tryptophan

Name: Similac Gold Milk Infant Formula (2) 800 gm
Description:
Product Description:

Similac Gold 2 is a new and improved formula for babies from 6 months to 12 months of age.

How to use:

Use as directed by your baby’s physician. Proper hygiene, handling and storage are important when preparing infant formula.
Failure to follow these instructions could result in severe harm.

Although Similac NeoSure powder is formulated for premature infants, powdered infant formulas are not sterile and should not be fed to premature infants or infants who might have immune problems unless directed and supervised by your baby’s physician.
Use water that has previously been heated at a full rolling boil for 5 minutes. Allow the water to cool and follow the mixing instructions carefully.
Use only the scoop enclosed in this tin to measure Similac NeoSure.
If you prepare more than one feeding, refrigerate immediately at 2 - 4 °C and use within 24 hours. Once feeding begins, use within one hour or discard.
Thoroughly wash feeding bottle, nipple, cap and all utensils to be used in preparing the feeding.
After rinsing soap from the utensils, boil them for 5 minutes.
Provide a clean surface on which to prepare the formula.
In a separate pan, heat water to a rolling boil for 5 minutes and allow it to cool.
Pour the correct amount of warm, previously boiled water into the sterilized feeding bottle.
Fill enclosed scoop, then scrape level with the straight edge of a knife.
Add one level scoop of Similac NeoSure to each 60 ml of water in bottle.
Mix until completely dissolved. Test temperature and feed formula within one hour.
Discard unused formula within one hour.

Caution & Warnings:

Never use a microwave oven to
prepare or warm formula. Serious burns can result. NOTE: Prepared formula may also be fed from a cup, or mixed with cereal or other solid foods.

Ingredients:

2-FL HMO, an ingredient naturally found in breast milk, to support your child’s immune system.
DHA, AA, Lutein, Natural Vitamin E, omega 3 & 6, taurine, choline, Zinc and iron which are key building blocks for mental, visual, language and physical development.
A unique fat blend without palm olein oil – clinically proven to support calcium absorption for strong bones.
Prebiotics, Probiotics and Nucleotides.

Product Details:

Manufacturer: Similac
Product Form: Powder
Quantity: 1 Pc
Categories: Baby Milk, Regular Formula, Stage 2 (6-12 months)

Name: Similac Gold Milk Formula Stage (3) (2*800G)
Description:
Product Description:

Similac Gold 3 is a new and improved formula for babies from 1 year to 3 years of age.








How to use:

DIRECTIONS FOR PREPARATION AND USE: Use and feed as directed by your physician. Proper

hygiene, handling, and storage are important when preparing infant formula. Failure to follow

these instructions could result in severe harm. Powdered infant formulas are not sterile and should

not be fed to premature infants or infants who might have immune problems unless directed and

supervised by your baby’s doctor.




1- Thoroughly wash feeding container and all utensils, then boil for 5 minutes. Set aside on clean surface.

2- In a separate pan, heat water to a rolling boil for 5 minutes and allow it to cool.

3- Pour the correct amount of warm, previously boiled water into the sterilized feeding container.

4- Fill enclosed scoop by pressing against the tin, then scrape level with the straight edge of a knife.

5- Add one level scoop of powder to each 60 mL of water. Mix until completely dissolved. Test temperature and feed.

6- Once the feeding begins, discard unused formula within 1 hour. Additional feedings may be stored in refrigerator (2 - 4 °C) for 24 hours.











Caution & Warnings:

STORAGE: Store unopened tin under normal room conditions (not to exceed 25 °C). Store opened tin with cover on, in a cool dry place (not in refrigerator) and use within 3 weeks.




WARNING: Never use a microwave oven to prepare or warm formula. Serious burns can result.

Mixing Formula with water above 35C May compromise the probiotics

Please read the label

2-FL HMO, an ingredientnaturally found in breast milk, to support your child’s immune system.

DHA, AA, Lutein, Natural Vitamin E, omega 3 & 6, taurine, choline, Zinc and iron which are key building blocks for mental, visual, language and physical development.

A unique fat blend without palm olein oil – clinically proven to support calcium absorption for strong bones.








Prebiotics, Probiotics and Nucleotides.

hygiene, handling, and storage are important when preparing infant formula. Failure to follow

these instructions could result in severe harm. Powdered infant formulas are not sterile and should

not be fed to premature infants or infants who might have immune problems unless directed and

supervised by your baby’s doctor.

1- Thoroughly wash feeding container and all utensils, then boil for 5 minutes. Set aside on clean surface.

2- In a separate pan, heat water to a rolling boil for 5 minutes and allow it to cool.

3- Pour the correct amount of warm, previously boiled water into the sterilized feeding container.

4- Fill enclosed scoop by pressing against the tin, then scrape level with the straight edge of a knife.

5- Add one level scoop of powder to each 60 mL of water. Mix until completely dissolved. Test temperature and feed.

6- Once the feeding begins, discard unused formula within 1 hour. Additional feedings may be stored in refrigerator (2 - 4 °C) for 24 hours.




Caution & Warnings:




STORAGE: Store unopened tin under normal room conditions (not to exceed 25 °C). Store opened tin with cover on, in a cool dry place (not in refrigerator) and use within 3 weeks.

WARNING: Never use a microwave oven to prepare or warm formula. Serious burns can result.

Name: Fam Wings Folded Night  48 pcs
Description:
Product Description:




Fam feminine pads with wings are all about that Natural Cotton Feel.

Designed for your comfort and softer than ever before, they provide the security needed to relieve the burden of those heavy days.
The design and security of each Fam pad provides around-the-clock protection, making you feel confident to get on with your day.
Fam is a highly absorbent pad with a 3D Core for maximum protection. 
The Pad has wings for better fit, flexibility and leak control.
 Natural Cotton feel top cover for unique Softness and Comfort
 Compressed and individually wrapped sanitary pads for ultimate protection
 It is developed in a way that locks moisture away for a leak free dryness.
All Fam products present Natural Cotton feel top cover for unique Softness and Comfort.
How to use:
Pads have adhesive strips to attach securely to your panties
Remove the paper backing and press the sticky side of the pad to your underwear
If your pad also has wings extra flaps that fold over the sides of your underwear
For more protection remove the paper backing and wrap the wings around the crotch pressing firmly to the underside of your panties

When should I change my pad :

You’ll want to change your pad regularly to stay clean and comfortable
Usually every 3–4 hours or more often if your flow is heavy
Remember to match the absorption capacity  of the pad your flow not your body type
Caution and Warnings :
Don't flush the used product in the toilet.
To avoid danger of suffocation, keep this plastic bag away from babies and children.

Name: Vicks Vaporub 100 gm
Description:
Product Description:

Use Vicks Vaporub Menthol and camphor to calm a cough, Eucalyptus and menthol relieve nose congestion, and Eucalyptus to relieve catarrh. Suitable for Adults and children over 2 years.





How to use:


Directions for use:


Adults: Rub liberally onto chest, throat and back. Cover whole area for maximum effect. Leave night clothes loose to allow vapours to be inhaled easily.
Children over 2 years: Apply lightly to chest and back. Leave clothes loose for easy inhalation. You can also use Inhalation Method.
Inhalation Method: If head cold or nasal catarrh persists, for deep action relief melt two teaspoons of Vicks VapoRub in a bowl of very hot not boiling water. Inhale the soothing medicated vapours for 10–15 minutes.

This product can be used with other medicines.




Warning and cautions:

Keep all medicines out of the reach of children.
For external use only
Avoid contact with eyes
Do not swallow or place in nostrils
If symptoms persist, or in case of fever, consult your doctor or pharmacist.
As with all medicines, keep out of reach and sight of children.
Do not use on children under 2 years of age
Do not heat in the microwave
Never reheat the mixture.

Features:

Intense Long Lasting Color
Perfect grey coverage
Oil Replacement Treatment 

How to use:











Preparation: 

Press the content of the tube into a non-metallic dish (plastic, glass or porcelain), then add the developer fluid and mix the two ingredients with a colouring brush until thoroughly combined.
Apply the emulsion to your hair as soon as you have finished mixing it.

Application: 

First Time Coloring: 

Apply to unwashed hair using the colouring brush.
Make sure that you do not miss any strands.
Then comb your hair through with a wide-toothed comb to achieve even distribution.

Root Coloring:

Make partings in your hair and apply the colouring emulsion to the roots.
Leave for 20 minutes then comb the colouring emulsion evenly right down to the ends of your hair.

Development Time:

Leave to soak for 30 minutes.
For root colouring it is 20 minutes for the roots and another 10 minutes for the whole of your hair.
The colour of the Colour emulsion may change during the soaking time.

Finish:

Finishing treatment with Oil Replacement• Rinse hair until water runs clear (using shampoo is not recommended).
Apply the Oil Replacement Sachet
Leave on for 2 minutes and then rinse again 

Caution & Warnings:

Wear suitable gloves.

Mixing ratio: 1:1Rinse hair well after application.
Hair colorants can cause severe allergic reactions.
Hair colorants can cause severe allergic reactions. This product is not intended for use on persons under the age of 16.

Temporary “black henna” tattoos may increase your risk of allergy.
Rinse immediately if product comes into contact with them.
Do not use to dye eyelashes or eyebrows.
Rinse hair well after application.
Wear suitable gloves.
Conduct an allergy alert test 48 hours before each time you color (see enclosed leaflet), even if you have already used coloring products before. So remember to buy the product 48 hours in advance.
In case of any reaction or when in doubt consult a doctor before using any hair color product.
Keep out of reach of children.

Do not color your hair if:

you have a rash on your face or sensitive, irritated and damaged scalp,
you have ever experienced any reaction after coloring your hair,
you have experienced a reaction to a temporary “black henna” tattoo in the past.

Name: Kotex Fem Napkins Cotton Maxi Super 26 pcs
Description:
Product Description:

Kotex Natural Maxi Thick Sanitary Pads are our No.1 skin care product for those medium to heavy flow period days. With these super highly absorbent sanitary napkins in reach, you can experience worry-free periods and ultimate peace of mind.

The exceptional features and innovative design of these medium to heavy flow sanitary pads offer natural comfort, ultimate protection, and worry-free periods day and night.

Unlike other solutions in the market, these thick sanitary pads not only feel like cotton but are also purely made of 100% cotton. They offer a natural, soft, and fresh feel against your skin. Plus, they contain 0% plastic, ink, and chlorine and are carefully crafted to be gentle on your sensitive, delicate intimate skin. Kotex natural sanitary pads for women also provide a hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested solution for your intimate care needs.

These natural sanitary pads for women feature an absorbent center and protective barriers that effectively capture medium to heavy menstrual flow. This allows you to feel fresh and to take on your day with ultimate confidence.

The flexible back channels of these medium to heavy flow natural sanitary pads for women are designed to prevent leaks at the back. This allows you to move freely without any worries of potential mishaps. In addition, Kotex Natural Maxi Thick Sanitary Pads come with wings for a secure fit, providing additional protection and peace of mind.

Kotex sanitary pads for women are designed to ensure that periods never get in any woman's way. They are her trusted ally that give her the freshness and confidence she needs to take on her day with ease.

For decades, Kotex has been present to cater to all feminine hygiene needs. From thick and thin pads to daily panty liners for everyday freshness, Kotex has continuously innovated. Its aim was always to broaden its product range to ensure maximum comfort, protection, and convenience for women around the world.




Product Features & Benefits:

NATURAL PROTECTION: Kotex Natural Maxi Thick Sanitary Pads are your ultimate companion for natural, gentle, and efficient protection on your medium to heavy flow period days.
100% COTTON: Kotex Natural Maxi Thick Sanitary Pads for women are made from 100% cotton and offer a natural, soft, and fresh feel against your skin.
HYPOALLERGENIC: Kotex Natural Maxi Thick Sanitary Pads contain 0% plastic, ink, and chlorine. They provide a hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested solution for your intimate. care needs.
ABSORBENT CENTER: These maxi sanitary napkins effectively capture and lock away even the heaviest flow for long-lasting freshness and confidence, day and night.
FREEDOM OF MOVEMENT: The protective barriers and back channels of these Kotex heavy flow maxi pads allow women to stay active without any worries of leaks or discomfort.
DISCOVER OUR OTHER PRODUCTS: Love the Kotex Natural Maxi Thick Sanitary Pads? Discover our full range of sanitary pads in all sizes, and daily panty liners designed to cater to feminine needs.









Product Details:

Quantity: 26 Pcs
Brand: Kotex
Product Form: Sanitary Pads
Product Type: Feminine Pads
Categories: Lady Care, Sanitary Care, Sanitary Napkins

How to use:

First Time Coloring:

Root Coloring:

Name: Novalac Novabean Baby Milk 400 Gm
Description:
Product Description:



NovalacNovabean is a special infant formula with complete nutrition may be recommended by your qualified health care professionals as a dietary management for constipation.


Novabeancontains Lactose as the sole source of carbohydrates, high Magnesium content &Locust bean gum which is a fiber, & adapted ratio of whey/casein.


It is specially designed toensure optimal growth for infantsto meet the specific nutritional requirements of the infants from birth to 12 months if breastfeeding is not applied.


For the infants aged over 6 months, NovalacNovabeancovers the nutritional requirements as part of a diversified diet that should be progressively introduced according to advice from your health care professionals.



How to use:



Always wash your hands before preparing the bottle


Clean and sterilize the feeding bottle, the nipple, and all the used materials, in boiled after for 10 minutes.


Boil good pure water for minutes and let cool down to 40C.


Pour the needed amount of water into the feeding bottle first.


Add the correct quantity of Novalac powder, using the measuring spoon enclosed in the tin.


Close the bottle, shake well until the powder is totally dissolved.


Let cool to lukewarm temperature 37C – Control the temperature on the inner face of our arm.


Feed immediately.


Each feeding should be consumed within one hour maximum after its preparation .



Caution & Warnings:










Do not use after the expiration date indicated under the tin (EXP).


After opening, use within 3 weeks .


Do not add sugar.


Do not keep the leftovers in the bottle.


Throw away the remaining infant formula quantities.


Do not prepare the bottle in advance but always just before the feeding.


Close the tin after each use with the plastic lid.


Store in a dry and cool place, away from light and contamination


Do not use the microwave to prepare or warm baby milk.


Incorrect preparation and storing can make your baby ill.





Product Details:

Brand: Novalac
Product Form: Powder
Categories: Baby Care, Baby Milk, Specialty Milk

Name: Novalac Baby Milk  (1) 400 gm
Description:
Product Description:

Novalac 1 is an infant milk formula suitable for feeding healthy infants from birth to 6 months when breastfeeding is not applied

it is closely matching the nutritional profile of breast milk, thus securing optimal growth and development from birth to age of 6 months.
For infants over 6 months, and in agreement with your health care professional, weaning food shall be gradually introduced in addition to Novalac 2 a follow-on formula when breastfeeding is not applied.
Novalac 1 is Iron-fortified and Gluten-free and has adequate proteins content source of protein Cow’s milk adapted content of carbohydrates and fats for optimal growth and development/Sucrose free.
Full range of vitamins and minerals
Adequate the energy level for protection from future obesity
In case of protein allergies, prematurity, low birth weight, or in case of immuno-compromised infants, please seek for qualified health professionals help for appropriate advice

How to use:

Clean and sterilize the feeding bottle, the nipple, and all the used materials, in boiled after for 10 minutes.
Boil good pure water for minutes and let cool down to 40C.
Pour the needed amount of water into the feeding bottle first.
Add the correct quantity of Novalac powder, using the measuring spoon enclosed in the tin .
Close the bottle, shake well until the powder is totally dissolved.
Let cool to lukewarm temperature 37C – Control the temperature on the inner face of our arm. Feed immediately. Each feeding should be consumed within one hour maximum after its preparation.

Caution & Warnings:

Do not use after the expiration date indicated under the tin (EXP).
After opening by 3 weeks.
Do not add sugar.
Do not keep the leftovers in the bottle. Throw away the remaining infant formula quantities.
Do not prepare the bottle in advance but always just before the feeding.
Close the tin after each use with the plastic lid.
Store in a dry and cool place, away from light and contamination.

Description:
Product Description:





NIVEA MEN Deep Impact deodorant offers long-lasting freshness with a strong woody masculine fragrance, ideal for men seeking enduring scent and confidence.


The effective formula includes black carbon, which helps keep you fresh throughout the day, emphasizing that long-lasting freshness has a deep impact.


The product comes in a convenient 150ml spray, making it easy to apply and perfect for daily use.





Product Features:





Enriched with black carbon to effectively absorb moisture and neutralize odor, ensuring long-lasting freshness even in demanding situations.


Features a captivating strong woody masculine fragrance that provides a confident scent, keeping you feeling revitalized and attractive all day long.


Designed in a sleek 150ml spray format, offering effortless application and perfect portability for on-the-go freshness whenever you need it.





Fragrance Family:





Strong Woody





How To Use:





Shake the canister well before use to ensure the formula is evenly mixed.


Hold the can about 15 cm away from your underarm or desired area.


Spray evenly, allowing the deodorant to dry before dressing to maximize effectiveness.


Use daily for best results, reapplying as needed throughout the day for continued freshness.





Cautions & Warnings:





Extremely flammable aerosol; keep away from heat, sparks, and open flames.


Pressurized container; may burst if heated or exposed to temperatures exceeding 50°C.


Do not spray on open flames or other ignition sources; no smoking during use.


Avoid contact with eyes and do not apply to irritated or damaged skin.


Keep out of reach of children and use exclusively for the intended purpose.


If irritation occurs, discontinue use and consult a doctor.


Avoid prolonged spraying and direct inhalation.

Iron and Calcium




How to use:

Bring the required amount of water to the boil and cool to 70 degrees Celsius
Pour approximately half the required amount of water into a clean bottle
Loosely fill the measuring spoon supplied and level off with the back of a knife
Screw the bottle closed and shake well, add the remaining water and shake well again
Cool the formula to drinking temperature
Check temperature on your wrist before feeding (37 degrees Celsius)




Caution & Warnings:

Store unopened tin under normal room temperature conditions (not to exceed 25° C).
Store opened tin with cover on, in a cool dry place (not in refrigerator) and use within 3 weeks.
Never use a microwave oven to prepare or warm formula

Features:

Oil Replacement Treatment 

How to use:











Preparation: 

Press the content of the tube into a non-metallic dish (plastic, glass or porcelain), then add the developer fluid and mix the two ingredients with a colouring brush until thoroughly combined.
Apply the emulsion to your hair as soon as you have finished mixing it.

Application: 

First Time Coloring: 

Apply to unwashed hair using the colouring brush.
Make sure that you do not miss any strands.
Then comb your hair through with a wide-toothed comb to achieve even distribution.

Root Coloring:

Make partings in your hair and apply the colouring emulsion to the roots.
Leave for 20 minutes then comb the colouring emulsion evenly right down to the ends of your hair.

Development Time:

Leave to soak for 30 minutes.
For root colouring it is 20 minutes for the roots and another 10 minutes for the whole of your hair.
The colour of the Colour emulsion may change during the soaking time.

Finish:

Finishing treatment with Oil Replacement• Rinse hair until water runs clear (using shampoo is not recommended).
Apply the Oil Replacement Sachet
Leave on for 2 minutes and then rinse again 

Caution & Warnings:

Wear suitable gloves.

Mixing ratio: 1:1Rinse hair well after application.
Hair colorants can cause severe allergic reactions.
Hair colorants can cause severe allergic reactions. This product is not intended for use on persons under the age of 16.

Temporary “black henna” tattoos may increase your risk of allergy.
Rinse immediately if product comes into contact with them.
Do not use to dye eyelashes or eyebrows.
Rinse hair well after application.
Wear suitable gloves.
Conduct an allergy alert test 48 hours before each time you color (see enclosed leaflet), even if you have already used coloring products before. So remember to buy the product 48 hours in advance.
In case of any reaction or when in doubt consult a doctor before using any hair color product.
Keep out of reach of children.

Do not color your hair if:

you have a rash on your face or sensitive, irritated and damaged scalp,
you have ever experienced any reaction after coloring your hair,
you have experienced a reaction to a temporary “black henna” tattoo in the past.

Name: Fem Hair Removing Cream Refreshing Lemon 120 Gm
Description:
Product Description:





Finally, a Hair Removal Cream carefully prepared to give your skin the gentle loving it deserves!


You’ve always trusted Fem Hair Removal Creams to remove even the most stubborn hair on your skin painlessly. Now we’ve gone a step further so that your skin is also pampered by natural & skin-respecting ingredients – your Fem now has Avocado Oil & extracts of 100% natural Sandal and helps to soothe your skin, keeping it nourished and soft.


Your skin looks beautiful when it’s soft and supple. This is our way of keeping it that way.


Love your skin with Fem!





How to use:





Apply Fem Hair Removal Cream evenly on the area from where you want to remove hair. Do not rub in


Leave cream on the skin for 3 minutes. To remove stubborn hair, leave for a maximum of 10 minutes.DO NOT EXCEED 10 MINUTES


Remove the cream with the spatula and see your unwanted hair come off immediately. Rinse skin thoroughly with plain water. Pat dry.


Gently massage the pH Balancing Soothing Moisture Lotion onto the area of skin where hair has been removed. Your skin will instantly feel cool, soothed and moisturized.





Caution & Warnings:





Read all the precautions on the pack and directions on the inner flap of the pack and retain the pack till full consumption. Follow the directions for use.


Before each use, TEST YOUR SKIN REACTION by applying the cream to a small part of the area you wish to treat, following the directions of use. If after 24 hours there is no adverse reaction, begin using. If you experience any smarting/tingling during use, remove the cream immediately and rinse thoroughly with water. If this sensation persists, seek medical advice.


After use, we recommend waiting 24 hours before applying an anti-perspirant, a perfumed product, swimming or sunbathing. Always wait 72 hours between applications.


Designed for use on legs, arms, underarms & bikini line, but not suitable for use on any other body parts.


Do not use on scars, moles, spotty, broken, irritated or sunburnt skin, on skin which has been depilated in the last 72 hours or on skin which has suffered an adverse reaction to hair removal creams in the past.


Check with your doctor before using if you are on any medication which can affect the skin or if you suffer from any skin related disorder.


In case of ingestion, consult a doctor immediately and show the outer pack.


Prolonged or frequently repeated skin contact may cause sensitivity or allergic reactions in some individuals.


AVOID CONTACT WITH EYES, rinse immediately with plenty of water and seek medical advice.


KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN.


Contains Thioglycolate.


Store in a cool, dark and dry place.


Rash/irration may occur in stray cases.


FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY


Contains Alkali.

Name: Nivea Micellar Brightening Water 400ml
Description:
Product Description:





NIVEA Brightening Micellar Water for dull and sensitive skin is enriched with Amino Acid Complex and 5% Serum with Vitamin C & E. It removes waterproof make-up, impurities and dirt with just a few featherlight swipes, leaving no greasy residue.


No rubbing is needed, therefore it cleanses the skin very gently. It brightens, revitalises and hydrates the skin for a more even and smooth skin complexion. The brightening effect is clinically tested.


The brightening formula does not contain perfume and its skin and eye compatibility is dermatologically and ophthalmologically approved.





Product Features:





Removes waterproof make-up, impurities and dirt with just a few featherlight swipes


Enriched with 5% Serum with Vitamin C & E and Amino Acid Complex to revitalise and hydrate the skin


Gently cleanses and hydrates the skin, leaving no greasy residue


Perfume free, dermatologically and ophthalmologically tested, so it can be safely used on the face, eyes and lips


Suitable for dull and sensitive skin





How to use:





Shake well to mix both phases, then soak a cotton pad with Micellar Water.


Gently wipe over your face and closed eyes to dissolve make-up and mascara.


No rinsing needed.





Caution & Warnings:





Apply over closed eyes.


Ingredient listings for our products might change over time with new innovations.


Whilst we try to update this as quickly as we can, it’s best to check the ingredients on your packaging to ensure it’s suitable for your needs.


Ensure the product is stored safely away from children.

CERELAC Wheat with Milk is a nutritious, rice-based infant cereal with milk powder.

Stir until the cereal is smooth and feed immediately using a clean spoon.
